title: Zoe Food
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine
description: Natural vegetarian food restaurant, bar, and store. Offers meals made with products that are organic, whole, seasonal, and local. Raw food available. Sunday brunch from 10.30-14.00. Collaborates with other organizations for the promotion of the food culture of the land and natural nutrition. Changed to 100% veg menu, June 2015.
